text: Folks who didn't watch the VMAs on Sunday because they were too busy watching relatives bone on Game of Thrones or escaping rising floodwaters, answer this : What did you hear, after - the - fact, about Katy Perry? Katy Perry was the host, and she was just... not overwhelming. No huge controversies, sure, but not even Katy's terrible opening monologue was especially memorable. That's a problem for Katy, but it might be an even bigger problem for American Idol producers, who are reportedly very concerned that they're paying $ 25 million to Katy Perry to be a judge only for her to flop.
